description.@en: My palate is so refined that I know if something is not aged right or if something is made incorrectly, or perhaps even poisoned.

system.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: You know the Alchemical Art of Create Drugs (from Article 9: Hexenmeister’s Almanack). With a sip, you automatically succeed at any Skill Test to determine if drinks have been drugged. Finally, you never suffer from the negative effects associated with Intoxication.
